425100.name: ReVen: XBridge Soundtrack
425100.description:
ReVen: XBridge Soundtrack. An exciting blend of orchestration meets electronic chip tunes. Comes with 34 high quality mp3s. Composed by Mark McLemore.

02.Adagio
03.Triumph

14.Enter the EGR
15.Galactic Battle

17.Home Base
18.The XBuilder
19.The Sacrifice
20.It Watches you
21.It knows You're Near
22.It is coming for you
23.Mission Complete
24.Mission Results
